description:
Douki-kun comes back to the restaurant and sees that Douki-chan has fallen asleep. He helps her get home, and then...?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mon collègue revient chercher ce qu`il avait oublié.
My Coworker Who Came Back to Pick Up What He Left Behind
Wasuremono o Tori ni Modotta Kaisha no Douki
忘れ物を取りに戻った会社の同期
